review_blob: This is a barley wine beer of the best body and flavor.  Not for the faint but if you like barley wine and a beer that could double as a meal, this is the one for you.  Every year stands on its own but if you have too many of these you will not stand on your own.  It packs a strong alcohol content.  This is the best is gets.  I have this cellared back to 1991.
Always an excellent Sierra Nevada brew.  Great flavor and body.
Some call it skunk beer.....OK so it has a different aroma, but it tastes pretty good and leave you pretty satisified.  As far as apearance.....You will always look good holding a Heiny......

Budweiser has mastered the use of rice in the brew process and is able to turn water in to what they call beer faster than any other brewer.  And that pisses me off.  This is not real beer.  They spend everything on advertising so how can you expect good ingredients.  Sorry Bud...  The appearance rating of 2 is for the can, not the beer inside.
